title: Veera Mahasamrat EV: Veera Vahana, Exponent Energy announce the 'World's first 15-minute charging intercity bus'
description: Veera Vahana has teamed up with Exponent Energy to launch the Veera Mahasamrat EV, a long-haul electric bus capable of rapid charging in 15 minutes. This innovative bus aims to reduce operating expenses for fleet owners by 30% and will initially focus on the Bengaluru-Hyderabad route with dedicated charging stations along the highway.
